name: Teamitt, inc.
overview:
What is Teamitt? Teamitt helps companies to unleash the passion of employees along with helping employees realize their purpose at work leading to innovation needed to stay competitive in ever-changing and challenging global markets.

In the current existing models motivating employees lies in the hands of their immediate managers. As we all know not every manager can be an expert in the art and science of motivating employees and even if they are, it is not humanly possible for any manager to motivate all employees on a daily basis and in a consistent manner.

The goal of Teamitt is to help turn this inefficiency into business profits by unleashing the untapped human potential in the workforce.

The best way to motivate employees is to show seamlessly, in real-time how their day-to-day operations are impacting the business goals of the company in an easy to participate, simple to engage and fun to learn environment. Teamitt helps to achieve this seamless integration. Engagement for innovation through gamification Engagement at work perpetuates creative ideas and innovative insights. Teamitt help create an engaging environment by infusing simple games into daily operations of employees. Receiving another work email is not as boring and mundane anymore. Mobile and Peer-to-Peer knowledge sharing and learning Company knowledge, operational insights are gained by employees and stored in employee brains. Teamitt makes it easy for employees to make that wealth of knowledge available to other employees in the company by incentivizing them with more visibility within the company. This knowledge sharing caters to the mobile workforce by making needed learning available from any devise at all times. Intelligent platform for operational efficiency Teamitt is an intelligent platform. It learns patterns among employees and patterns among projects. This intelligence can be applied for operational efficiency. Fresh, relevant and insightful company portal It is the dream of every company management that employees spend time on company portal. Teamitt helps to make this reality by keeping the company portal filled with content and information that is fresh, relevant and insightful in real-time. Employee personal goals center Teamitt comes with employee personal goals center making employees feel valued by the company resulting in building employee centric culture. Employees can create, track and achieve their personal goals leading to employees associating workplace with their personal achievement and personal wellbeing. Data driven and metric driven Measurement makes informed decisions possible. Teamitt measures and provides metrics for all the activity taking place on the platform.
